item.title: Understanding Cursor Pagination and Why It's So Fast (Deep Dive)
item.description: While offset pagination is widely used, cursor-based pagination offers significant performance advantages - my tests show a 17x speedup when paginating through a million-record dataset in PostgreSQL. Let's take a deep dive into cursor pagination, compare it with offset pagination, and examine the SQL execution plans. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/understanding-cursor-pagination-and-why-its-so-fast-deep-dive
